EmailTemplate.name: RE: Call with Sara from MBO (1354314394.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Call with Sara from MBO (1354314394.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi David, Thank you so much for getting in touch with me, I am sorry I missed your call today. I am very happy to hear you will be coming back with us. Please follow the steps below to complete your re-enrollment. - Log in to the MBO site www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Click the Enrollment link once you are logged in - Confirm contact information - Print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment - You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) - Send me your clients contact information (name, email, phone number) and I will reach out to get a contract in place. - The link to my private page can be found here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> there are lots of great resources on this page and I encourage you to bookmark it. Please contact me with any questions and have a nice weekend. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: David Snow [mailto:snowflakes@mindspring.com] Sent: Thursday, November 29, 2012 8:33 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Call with Sara from MBO Sara, We are meeting with a CPA on Tuesday. In speaking with an estate planning/tax attorney it seems that we will be receiving 1099 money from my son's monthly account, finally approved by the Court of Probate at the end of October, that will be payroll based. We would like to move forward with joining MBO Partners. I have a COBRA Insurance payment that I would like to include as an expense this coming December. Please advise how we should proceed.Thank you, Sincerely,David Snow860-857-9531 cell Also, I just received a request to review a 6 month contract assignment to help build the South Carolina Exchange for the Health Care Affordablility act (ObamaCare), starting next year so I will be looking at this as well. </htm
